attributes.description:
"**INPUTS** 

  User Input: 'Lets start afresh, write an announcement for

The announcement is regarding the class event that is on 24th August. This is going to be specifically for Class 10 and I would like students to share what all activities that they wanna do. Just a fun day for students.'

  Metadata:
  - Last Announcement Class: 'Event'
  - Last Announcement Summary: 'Join us for our annual gala event, celebrating community achievements.'
  - Last Announcement Event Date: '2023-11-01'

Your task is to use given user input and given metadata to determine the values for the following important parameters:
1. announcement_class: The class or grade for which the announcement has to be.
2. announcement_summary: A brief summary which will be used to generate the title and body for draft of the announcement.
3. announcement_event_date: The date at which the event will occur for which the announcement is being done.

You must adhere to the following guidelines while determining the values:
- Announcement Summary: This has to be detailed enough to make sure a good title and body is generated for draft of the announcement
- Announcement Event Date: The date has to be in YYYY-MM-DD format like 2025-04-05, 2024-10-31, etc. User may use abbreviations like 6th June, August 15, August 21, 2025, etc. You must call "resolve_date_tool" tool to fetch the date from the user input using payload: 
  {"query": user_query}.
- Announcement Class: This will determine the audience for which the announcement has to be done. It will have values like 10, 7, etc.

If any of the important parameters are not available either in user input or metadata, send back a follow up question to the user asking for them.
"

attributes.description:
"**INPUTS** 
Announcement Class: Take announcement_class from previous task
Announcement Summary: Take announcement_summary from previous task
Announcement Event Date: Take announcement_event_date from previous task

Your task is to formulate a draft of the announcement which the instructor wants to make, using the announcement_class, announcement_summary, and announcement_event_date.
Do not use any information which is not given to you.
- First curate an eye catchy title using the announcement summary. This will be the title of the draft.
- Second add the announcement_class for which the announcement is.
- Third curate a student friendly body using the announcement summary. This will be the body of the draft.
- Fourth add the announcement_event_date at the end. This should be at the end showcasing when the event will occur.
"

", "summary": "**INPUTS** 
Announcement Class: Take announcement_class from previous task
Announcement Summary: Take...", "raw": "{
  "announcement_class": "10",
  "announcement_summary": "This is going to be specifically for Class 10 and I would like students to share what all activities that they wanna do. Just a fun day for students.",
  "announcement_event_date": "2025-08-24",
  "announcement_title": "Let's Plan Our Fun Day Together, Class 10!",
  "draft_announcement": "Dear Class 10 students,\n\nI am excited to announce that we will be having a special fun day! This day is all about you and we want to hear from each of you about the activities you'd like to participate in. It’s a chance for us to enjoy, unwind, and create some wonderful memories together. \n\nPlease think of your favorite games, activities, or ideas and be ready to share them. Your input is valuable, and we want to make this event enjoyable for everyone!\n\nMark your calendars for August 24th, 2025, as we come together for a day full of fun and laughter.\n\nLooking forward to your amazing suggestions!\n\nBest,\n[Your Instructor's Name]"
}", "pydantic": {"announcement_class": "10", "announcement_summary": "This is going to be specifically for Class 10 and I would like students to share what all activities that they wanna do. Just a fun day for students.", "announcement_event_date": "2025-08-24", "announcement_title": "Let's Plan Our Fun Day Together, Class 10!", "draft_announcement": "Dear Class 10 students,

I am excited to announce that we will be having a special fun day! This day is all about you and we want to hear from each of you about the activities you'd like to participate in. It’s a chance for us to enjoy, unwind, and create some wonderful memories together. 

Please think of your favorite games, activities, or ideas and be ready to share them. Your input is valuable, and we want to make this event enjoyable for everyone!

Mark your calendars for August 24th, 2025, as we come together for a day full of fun and laughter.

Looking forward to your amazing suggestions!

Best,
